title: Biking to Work Is Gaining Ground, Just Not How It Should Be – Urbanist Update
content:
Conflicting stories about how bikes are booming, how they’re shrinking, and how they’re flatlining all at the same time, registration taxes for heavier cars, and how France painted squiggles in the road for safety.

Read the full article at Biking to Work Is Gaining Ground, Just Not How It Should Be – Urbanist Update on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
